languages.text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.
languages.original_text: Существо получает −<u>(5 + 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + бонус ОБЩ великого стратега))</u> к Дальнему Бою, −25% к {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} и −<u>(5 + бонус ИНТ + бонус ОБЩ великого стратега)</u> к Ближнему Бою. Кроме того, существа, у которых есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие, теряют по 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, а существа с дистанционным оружием пытаются переместиться за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} (этот дополнительный эффект не действует на некоторых сильных врагов).

traits.locale_text:
Enemies suffer -<u>5-2×(Strategist's INT+FEL bonus)</u> Ballistic Skill, -25% rate of fire, and -<u>5-(Strategist 's INT+FEL bonus)</u> Weapon Skill during attacks against them.
Additionally, melee enemies have their speed reduced by -3, and ranged enemies try to get into a cover. Enemy counts as a melee enemy if he has at least one melee weapon.
! This additional effect does not work on some strong enemies.

Enemies suffer −<u>(5 – 2 × (Strategist's INT + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% rate of fire, and −<u>(5 − (Strategist 's INT + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill during attacks.
Additionally, melee enemies have their speed reduced by −3, and ranged enemies try to get into cover. An enemy counts as a melee enemy if they have at least one melee weapon.
! This additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

languages.text: Существо получает −<u>(5 + 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + бонус ОБЩ великого стратега))</u> к Дальнему Бою, −25% к {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} и −<u>(5 + бонус ИНТ + бонус ОБЩ великого стратега)</u> к Ближнему Бою. Кроме того, существа, у которых есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие, теряют по 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, а существа с дистанционным оружием пытаются переместиться за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g} (этот дополнительный эффект не действует на некоторых сильных врагов).
languages.original_text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Противники получают −<u>(5 – 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега))</u> к Дальнему Бою, −25% к скорострельности и −<u>(5 − (бонус ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега))</u> к Ближнему Бою.
Кроме того, противники, у которых есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие, теряют по 3 ОП, а противники с дальнобойным оружием пытаются переместиться за укрытие.
! Этот дополнительный эффект не действует на некоторых сильных врагов.

Противники получают −<u>(5 – 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега))</u> к Дальнему Бою, −25% к скорострельности и −<u>(5 − (бонус ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега))</u> к Ближнему Бою.
Кроме того, противники, у которых есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие, теряют по 3 ОП, а противники с дальнобойным оружием пытаются переместиться за укрытие.
! Этот дополнительный эффект не действует на некоторых сильных врагов.

languages.text: 受影响的生物弹道技能降低<u>（5+2×（战略大师的智力+{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}社交{/g}加值））</u>，武器技能降低<u>（5+（战略大师的智力+社交加值））</u>，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}降低25%。除此之外，受影响的近战生物{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低3点，远程生物则会尝试进入{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}。如果敌人至少拥有一件近战武器，则视为近战敌人。此额外效果对某些较为强大的敌人无效。
languages.original_text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

traits.locale_text:
所有受影响的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低<u>（5+2×（战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}））</u>，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低<u>（5+（战略大师的智力+社交加值））</u>，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}降低25%。
除此之外，所有近战敌人的速度减低3点，{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}敌人会尝试进入{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}。如果敌人至少拥有一件近战武器，则视为近战敌人。
！此效果对某些较为强大的敌人无效。

受影响的生物{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低<u>（5+2×（{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}加值{/g}））</u>，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低<u>（5+（战略大师的智力+社交加值））</u>，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}降低25%。除此之外，受影响的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}生物{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低3点，{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}生物则会尝试进入{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}。如果敌人至少拥有一件近战武器，则视为近战敌人。此额外效果对某些较为强大的敌人无效。

languages.text: La criatura sufre −<u>(5 + 2 × (bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del gran estratega))</u> a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, −25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} y −<u>(5 + ( bonificación por INT + bonificación por EMP del gran estratega))</u> a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}. Además, las criaturas que combaten en cuerpo a cuerpo pierden −3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, mientras que las criaturas que combaten a distancia intentan ponerse a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubierto{/g}. Una criatura cuenta como combatiente cuerpo a cuerpo si tiene al menos un arma cuerpo a cuerpo. El efecto adicional puede no funcionar contra algunos enemigos más fuertes.
languages.original_text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Los enemigos reciben un −<u>(5 – 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g}))</u> a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, un −25 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} y un −<u>(5 − (bonificaciones por INT + EMP del gran estratega))</u> a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} durante los ataques.
Además, los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} de los enemigos cuerpo a cuerpo se reduce en −3 y los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} buscan {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}. Un enemigo es de cuerpo a cuerpo si tiene al menos un arma de combate cuerpo a cuerpo.
! Este efecto adicional no funciona con algunos de los enemigos más poderosos.

languages.text: Die Kreatur erleidet −<u>(5 + 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-Bonus des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, −25 % {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} und −<u>(5 + (INT-Bonus + GEF-Bonus des Großstrategen))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}. Außerdem werden die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} von {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Kreaturen um −3 reduziert und {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Kreaturen versuchen, in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} zu gehen. Eine Kreatur gilt als Nahkampf-Kreatur, wenn sie über mindestens eine Nahkampfwaffe verfügt. Dieser Zusatzeffekt hat auf einige stärkere Feinde keine Wirkung.
languages.original_text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Während Angriffen erleiden Feinde −<u>(5 + 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g}))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, −25 % {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} und −<u>(5 + (INT- + GEF-Bonus des Großstrategen))</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}.
Außerdem werden die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} von Nahkampffeinden um −3 reduziert. {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Feinde versuchen, in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} zu gehen. Ein Feind gilt als Nahkampffeind, wenn er über mindestens eine Nahkampfwaffe verfügt.
! Dieser Zusatzeffekt hat auf einige stärkere Feinde keine Wirkung.

languages.text: La créature subit −<u>(5­ + 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'INT + bonus de SOC du grand stratège))</u> à la Compétence balistique, −25 % à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} et −<u>(5 + (bonus d'INT du grand stratège + bonus de SOC))</u> à la Compétence d'arme. En outre, les créatures combattant en mêlée voient leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} réduits de 3 et les créatures combattant à distance tentent de se mettre {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}. Une créature est considérée comme combattant en mêlée si elle possède au moins une arme de mêlée. Cet effet supplémentaire ne fonctionne pas sur certains ennemis particulièrement puissants.
languages.original_text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Les pénalités suivantes s'appliquent aux ennemis pendant les attaques : -<u>(5 - 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Stratège))</u> sur la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}, -25 % sur la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} et -<u>(5 - (bonus d'INT + FRA du Stratège))</u> sur la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g}.
En outre, la vitesse des ennemis de mêlée est réduite de -3 et les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distants{/g} tentent de se mettre à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couvert{/g}. Un ennemi est considéré comme un ennemi de mêlée s'il possède au moins une arme de mêlée.
! Cet effet supplémentaire ne fonctionne pas sur certains ennemis particulièrement puissants.

languages.text: この生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が−<u>(5 – 2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ボーナス{/g}))</u>、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}バースト速度{/g}が-25%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}が −<u>(5 − (戦略家のINT + FELボーナス))</u>される。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行う生物は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が-3され、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔攻撃{/g}を行う生物は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽{/g}に隠れようとする。近接武器を1つ以上持っている敵は、近接攻撃を行う敵とみなされる。この追加効果は、一部の強敵には適用されない。
languages.original_text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.

traits.locale_text:
敵は攻撃中、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が−<u>(5 – 2 × (戦略家の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}))</u>、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}が-25%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が −<u>(5 − (戦略家のINT + FELボーナス))</u>される。
さらに、近接攻撃を行う敵は速度が-3され、{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃を行う敵は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}に隠れようとする。近接武器を1つ以上持っている敵は、近接攻撃を行う敵とみなされる。
！この追加効果は、一部の強敵には適用されない。

languages.text: Yaratığın Balistik Yetenek niteliği <u>(5 + 2 × (Büyük Stratejist'in ZEK {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} + SYL bonusu))</u>, {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} %25 ve Silah Yeteneği niteliği de <u>(Büyük Stratejist'in ZEK bonusu + SYL bonusu))</u> kadar düşer. Buna ilaveten yakın dövüş yaratıklarının {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} değeri 3 puan azalır ve menzilli yaratıklar {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} ardına saklanmaya çalışır. En az bir yakın dövüş silahı bulunan bir yaratık, yakın dövüş yaratığı sayılır ve bu ilave etki bazı güçlü düşmanlara işlemez.
languages.original_text: The creature suffers −<u>(5 + 2 × (Grand Strategist's INT {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + FEL bonus))</u> Ballistic Skill, −25% {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}, and −<u>(5 + (Grand Strategist's INT bonus + FEL bonus))</u> Weapon Skill. Additionally, melee creatures have their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reduced by −3, and ranged creatures try to get behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. A creature counts as a melee creature if it has at least one melee weapon, and this additional effect does not work on some stronger enemies.
